0871A46B.Toast: Complete the ritual to cleanse the Dark Thicket.

2C05E0A0.Callback37Header: Bring Mochrann to the final font of corruption

38AA8D97.Callback10Header: Bring Mochrann to the font of corruption

5690A71C.Phase16Description: I have cleansed the first location.  I should bring Shob'ha's familiar to the next site.

5CD6EA0D.Phase8Description: To cleanse the Dark Thicket, I need to escort Shob'ha's familiar, Mochrann, to the worst areas and protect it while it performs the ritual.

9211671E.Callback35Header: Bring Mochrann to the next font of corruption

B78F4DA1.Callback56Header: Wait for Mochrann to cleanse the corruption

D53BFF05.Phase0Description: The ritual was successful, but at the cost of the woodwraith.  It seems to have petrified in place and still glows faintly with the Crone's magic.

E96ABF3F.Phase19Description: I have cleansed two areas of corruption within the Dark Thicket.  Only one other remains.
